name: AppInstallerFile
description: Create or update an App Installer file for MSIX apps
author: Microsoft Corporation

inputs.name: package
inputs.label: Package
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path to the package or bundle.

inputs.name: outputPath
inputs.label: Output File Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: The path of the App Installer to be written.

inputs.name: method
inputs.label: Method to Create App Installer File
inputs.helpMarkDown: Method used to create the App Installer file.

options.create: Create a new App Installer file
options.update: Update an existing App Installer file

inputs.name: existingFile
inputs.label: Path to Existing App Installer File
inputs.helpMarkDown: The path of the existing App Installer file to update.

inputs.name: versionUpdateMethod
inputs.label: Method to Update the App Installer File's Version
inputs.helpMarkDown: Increment the major/minor/build/revision of the App Installer file or enter a version number to be used.

inputs.name: fileVersion
inputs.label: Version for App Installer file
inputs.helpMarkDown: The version number which will be given. Must take the form (major).(minor).(build).(revision).

inputs.name: uri
inputs.label: URI
inputs.helpMarkDown: Web URI to the redirected App Installer file.

inputs.name: mainItemUri
inputs.label: Main Package/Bundle URI
inputs.helpMarkDown: URI to the app package/bundle location.

inputs.name: updateOnLaunch
inputs.label: Update On Launch
inputs.helpMarkDown: Set the app to check for updates when launched.

inputs.name: hoursBetweenUpdateChecks
inputs.label: Hours Between Update Checks
inputs.helpMarkDown: How often the system will check for updates to the app.

inputs.name: showPromptWhenUpdating
inputs.label: Show UI to User when Updating
inputs.helpMarkDown: Show a UI to notify the user if an update occurs when launching the app.

inputs.name: updateBlocksActivation
inputs.label: Update Blocks App Activation
inputs.helpMarkDown: Block the app from launching until the update finishes.
inputs.visibleRule: method = create && updateOnLaunch = true && showPromptWhenUpdating = true
